lead_paragraph: Sure, Sid and Geno still are around. Chris Kunitz and Kris Letang, too. But these Pittsburgh Penguins aren't just a team of big names, but one of guys still trying to make a name in the NHL, too.

headline.print_headline: Rust Scores 2 as Pens Beat Lightning in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference Finals
headline.main: Rust Scores 2 as Pens Beat Lightning in Game 7 of the Eastern Conference Finals
